mapper.select: SELECT a.orgid, a.name as orgname, a.comment, (SELECT korname FROM info_userinfo c WHERE a.prno = c.userno) as prname, (SELECT korname FROM info_userinfo c WHERE a.vprno = c.userno) as vprname, b.name as orgtype, a.filecontent FROM info_organization a LEFT JOIN cod_orgtype b ON a.orgtypeid = b.orgtypeid WHERE a.orgtypeid = #{orgtypeid}

SELECT a.orgid, a.name as orgname, a.comment, DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as regdate, a.moddate, a.prno, (select korname from info_userinfo c where a.prno = c.userno) as prname, a.vprno, (select korname from info_userinfo c where a.vprno = c.userno) as vprname, b.name as orgtype, b.useyn FROM info_organization a LEFT JOIN cod_orgtype b on a.orgtypeid = b.orgtypeid ORDER BY b.orgtypeid ASC, a.regdate DESC;

SELECT a.orgid, a.name as orgname, a.comment, DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as regdate, a.moddate, a.prno, (select korname from info_userinfo c where a.prno = c.userno) as prname, a.vprno, (select korname from info_userinfo c where a.vprno = c.userno) as vprname, b.name as orgtype, b.useyn FROM info_organization a LEFT JOIN cod_orgtype b on a.orgtypeid = b.orgtypeid WHERE a.orgid = #{orgid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO info_organization( name, comment, regdate, moddate, prno, vprno, orgtypeid ) VALUES( #{orgname}, #{comment}, NOW(), NOW(), #{prno}, #{vprno}, #{orgtypeid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE info_organization SET name = #{name}, comment = #{comment}, moddate = NOW(), prno = #{prno}, vprno = #{vprno} WHERE orgid = #{orgid}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM brd_orgnization a LEFT JOIN info_organization b on a.orgid = b.orgid WHERE b.orgtypeid = #{orgtypeid}

SELECT a.brdid, a.orgid, b.name as orgname, a.content, DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as regdate, a.title, c.korname, a.count, a.likes FROM brd_orgnization a LEFT JOIN info_organization b on a.orgid = b.orgid LEFT JOIN info_userinfo c on a.userno = c.userno WHERE a.orgid = #{orgid} AND b.orgtypeid = #{orgtypeid}
